Description:
We are a leading cement manufacturer and supplier, and we are looking for a highly motivated and experienced Production Manager to join our team. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in cement production and the industrial sector, with a proven track record of success in managing and optimizing manufacturing operations, improving quality and efficiency, and meeting production goals.Responsibilities:Develop and implement production plans and strategies to meet production goals and objectives.
Manage and oversee all aspects of the cement production process, including raw materials, inventory, production lines, and quality control.
Ensure that all production processes are efficient and cost-effective.
Identify and implement opportunities for quality improvement and process optimization.
Manage a team of production supervisors and operators.
Ensure compliance with all safety and environmental regulations.Skills
Skills:
Bachelor's degree in engineering.
7+ years of experience in production management, preferably in the cement industry.
Strong track record of success in meeting production goals and improving quality and efficiency.
Excellent leadership and communication skills.
Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
Strong knowledge of cement production processes and the industrial sector.
